properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
TUNISIA.
DNC 08.
1. VESSEL, BLUE HULL, 50 PERSONS ON BOARD,
   REQUESTING ASSISTANCE IN 34-05.00N 011-42.00E
   AT 080016Z MAR. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE,
   REPORTS TO  JRCC LIBYA,
   PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
   E-MAIL: LCG.OPS.RM@MOD.GOV.LY,
   LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY, LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY
   OR MRCC ROME,
   PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
   EMAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 478/24.
